content: विभ्रम् {c1c} {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To roam, wander about. {@--2@} To hover, whirl or wheel round. {@--3@} To scare away, disperse, scatter about. {@--4@} To be confused or disordered, be bewildered or perplexed; <ls>Bg. 16. 16.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To confuse, confound; प्रभामत्तश्चंद्रो जगादिदमहो विभ्रमयति <ls>K. P. 10.</ls>
